title: Bug splat not letting me get in the client
body: I have 2 accounts: One in NA server and one in LAN server, I wanted to switch from the NA account to the LAN account by changing region in the client, when I clicked in "Latin america north", the client bugsplatted and when I press the league icon literally I can't get in the client anymore, the bugsplat message shows up instead of the client and I can't change region to NA again, heck, I can't even log in anymore, what do I do? (I'm a Mac user BTW)

replies.body: You may need to restart your computer in case the crash persists in the background and preventing launch.  The bugsplat itself might be caused by some bad game files or connection, which the steps in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide can help resolve.  Be sure to use the steps for Mac, though, and let me know if you have any questions.
I can't do a repair because I can't get in the client tho
No worries!  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), which will be able to do that for you outside of the client.
